mapper.sql: red_packet_img_id, member_account, red_packet_img_money_count, red_packet_img_count, red_packet_img_stock, red_packet_img_url, red_packet_img_info, red_packet_img_luck_star, red_packet_img_start_time, red_packet_img_end_time, red_packet_img_question, red_packet_img_options, red_packet_img_answer, red_packet_img_sex, red_packet_img_age_start, red_packet_img_age_end, red_packet_img_date
mapper.insert:
insert into zx_app_img_red_packet
red_packet_img_id,
member_account,
red_packet_img_money_count,
red_packet_img_count,
red_packet_img_stock,
red_packet_img_url,
red_packet_img_info,
red_packet_img_luck_star,
red_packet_img_question,
red_packet_img_options,
red_packet_img_answer,
red_packet_img_sex,
red_packet_img_age_start,
red_packet_img_age_end,
red_packet_img_date,
province_name,
city_name,
county_name,
red_packet_img_type,
#{redPacketImgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{memberAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{redPacketImgMoneyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{redPacketImgCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{redPacketImgStock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{redPacketImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{redPacketImgInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{redPacketImgLuckStar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{redPacketImgQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{redPacketImgOptions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{redPacketImgAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{redPacketImgSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{redPacketImgAgeStart,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{redPacketImgAgeEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NOW(),
#{provName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{redPacketImgType}
mapper.update:
update zx_app_img_red_packet
member_account = #{memberAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
red_packet_img_money_count = #{redPacketImgMoneyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
red_packet_img_count = #{redPacketImgCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
red_packet_img_stock = #{redPacketImgStock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
red_packet_img_url = #{redPacketImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
red_packet_img_info = #{redPacketImgInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
red_packet_img_luck_star = #{redPacketImgLuckStar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
red_packet_img_start_time = #{redPacketImgStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
red_packet_img_end_time = #{redPacketImgEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
red_packet_img_question = #{redPacketImgQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
red_packet_img_options = #{redPacketImgOptions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
red_packet_img_answer = #{redPacketImgAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
red_packet_img_sex = #{redPacketImgSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
red_packet_img_age_start = #{redPacketImgAgeStart,jdbcType=INTEGER},
red_packet_img_age_end = #{redPacketImgAgeEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
red_packet_img_date = #{redPacketImgDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketImgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update zx_app_img_red_packet
red_packet_img_count = #{redPacketImgCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
red_packet_img_stock = #{redPacketImgStock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
red_packet_img_unit_amount = #{redPacketImgUnitAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
red_packet_img_luck_star = #{redPacketImgLuckStar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
red_packet_img_start_time = #{redPacketImgStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
red_packet_img_end_time = #{redPacketImgEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketImgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.red_packet_img_id AS redPacketId, a.member_account AS memberAccount, a.red_packet_img_money_count AS redPacketMoneyCount, a.red_packet_img_count AS redPacketCount, a.red_packet_img_stock AS redPacketStock, DATE_FORMAT(a.red_packet_img_date,'%m月%d日%H:%i') AS redPacketDate, a.red_packet_img_date AS redPacketDateSort, (red_packet_img_count - red_packet_img_stock) AS robRedPacketCount, '图文广告' AS redPacketType FROM zx_app_img_red_packet AS a WHERE a.member_account = #{memberAccount} ORDER BY a.red_packet_img_date DESC
LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT a.red_packet_img_id AS redPacketImgId, a.member_account AS redPacketImgUserId, a.red_packet_img_money_count AS redPacketMoneyCount, a.red_packet_img_count AS redPacketImgCount, a.red_packet_img_stock AS redPacketImgStock, a.red_packet_img_info AS redPacketImgInfo, a.red_packet_img_luck_star AS redPacketImgLuckStar, a.red_packet_img_start_time AS redPacketImgStartTime, a.red_packet_img_end_time AS redPacketImgEndTime, a.red_packet_img_question AS redPacketImgQuestion, a.red_packet_img_options AS redPacketImgOptions, a.red_packet_img_answer AS redPacketImgAnswer, a.red_packet_img_sex AS redPacketImgSex, a.red_packet_img_age_start AS redPacketImgAgeStart, a.red_packet_img_age_end AS redPacketImgAgeEnd, a.red_packet_img_date AS redPacketImgDate, a.red_packet_img_type AS redPacketImgType FROM zx_app_img_red_packet a WHERE a.red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketImgId}
AND a.member_account = #{memberAccount}

SELECT red_packet_img_info_id AS redPacketImgInfoId, red_packet_img_id AS redPacketImgId, red_packet_img_user_id AS redPacketImgUserId, red_packet_img_money AS redPacketImgMoney, red_packet_img_luck_star AS redPacketImgLuckStar, red_packet_img_date AS redPacketImgDate FROM zx_app_img_red_packet_info WHERE red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketImgId} AND red_packet_img_user_id = #{robUserId} LIMIT 1

SELECT zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_info_id AS "redPacketInfoId", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_id AS "redPacketId", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_user_id AS "redPacketUserId", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_money AS "redPacketMoney", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_luck_star AS "redPacketLuckStar", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_date AS "redPacketDate", UNIX_TIMESTAMP( zx_app_img_red_packet.red_packet_img_end_time ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( zx_app_img_red_packet.red_packet_img_start_time ) AS "timeSum" FROM zx_app_img_red_packet_info LEFT JOIN zx_app_img_red_packet ON zx_app_img_red_packet.red_packet_img_id = zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_id WHERE zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketImgId} AND zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_user_id IS NULL LIMIT 1

SELECT zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_info_id AS "redPacketInfoId", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_id AS "redPacketId", zx_app_img_red_packet.member_account AS "redPacketUserId", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_user_id AS "robRedPacUserId", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_money AS "redPacketMoney", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_luck_star AS "redPacketLuckStar", zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_date AS "redPacketDate", zx_app_img_red_packet.red_packet_img_stock AS "redPacketStock", UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zx_app_img_red_packet.red_packet_img_end_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zx_app_img_red_packet.red_packet_img_start_time) AS "timeSum" FROM zx_app_img_red_packet_info LEFT JOIN zx_app_img_red_packet ON zx_app_img_red_packet.red_packet_img_id = zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_id WHERE zx_app_img_red_packet_info.red_packet_img_info_id = #{redPacketInfoId} LIMIT 1

SELECT b.red_packet_img_id AS redPacketId, -- 红包ID b.member_account AS memberAccount, -- 发布红包用户ID b.red_packet_img_money_count AS redPacketMoneyCount, -- 红包金额 b.red_packet_img_count AS redPacketCount,-- 红包个数 b.red_packet_img_info AS redPacketInfo,-- 红包显示信息 b.red_packet_img_url AS redPacketImgUrl, -- 红包视频链接地址 UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.red_packet_img_end_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.red_packet_img_start_time) AS timeSum, -- 抢红包总耗时 b.red_packet_img_date AS redPacketDate,-- 发布红包时间 a.head_img_url AS headImgUrl,-- 发布红包用户头像ID IFNULL(a.nickname,a.member_account) AS nickName, -- 发布红包用户昵称 a.id AS userId -- 用户账号 FROM zx_app_img_red_packet b LEFT JOIN t_member a ON a.member_account = b.red_packet_img_user_id WHERE b.red_packet_img_id IN ( SELECT red_packet_img_id FROM zx_app_img_red_packet_info WHERE red_packet_img_user_id = #{robUserId}) AND b.red_packet_img_stock = 0

SELECT b.member_account AS memberAccount,-- 用户账号 b.head_img_url AS headImgUrl,-- 头像图片链接 IFNULL( b.nickname, b.member_account ) AS nickName,-- 昵称 c.red_packet_img_info AS redPacketInfo,-- 红包广告标语 c.red_packet_img_count AS redPacketCount,-- 红包总个数 c.red_packet_img_stock AS redPacketStock,-- 红包剩余个数 c.red_packet_img_url AS redPacketImgUrl,-- 红包视频链接地址 UNIX_TIMESTAMP( c.red_packet_img_end_time ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( c.red_packet_img_start_time ) AS timeSum -- 抢红包总耗时 FROM zx_app_img_red_packet c LEFT JOIN t_member b ON b.member_account = c.member_account WHERE c.red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketImgId}

SELECT b.id AS userId,-- 用户ID b.head_img_url AS headImgUrl,-- 头像图片链接 IFNULL( b.nickname, b.member_account ) AS nickName,-- 昵称 b.member_account AS memberAccount,-- 用户账号 a.red_packet_img_money AS redPacketMoney,-- 非当前用户抢钱金额 a.red_packet_img_luck_star AS redPacketLuckStar,-- 非当前用户是否是手气最佳 a.red_packet_img_date AS redPacketDate -- 抢红包时间 FROM zx_app_img_red_packet_info a LEFT JOIN t_member b ON b.member_account = a.red_packet_img_user_id WHERE a.red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketImgId} AND a.red_packet_img_user_id IS NOT NULL
select COUNT(1) from zx_app_img_red_packet_info WHERE red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketImgId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND red_packet_img_user_id = #{memberAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select v.red_packet_img_stock AS "redPacketStock", v.red_packet_img_count AS redPacketCount, IFNULL(s.red_packet_user_id,"0") AS "isWrong" from zx_app_img_red_packet v LEFT JOIN zx_app_img_red_packet_scrape s on v.red_packet_img_id = s.red_packet_id and #{memberAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = s.red_packet_user_id where v.red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketImgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select v.red_packet_img_id AS "redPacketId", v.red_packet_img_count AS "redPacketCount", v.red_packet_img_stock AS "redPacketStock", IFNULL(p.red_packet_img_user_id,"0") AS "isRobRedPacket", IFNULL(s.red_packet_user_id,"0") AS "isWrong" from zx_app_img_red_packet v LEFT JOIN zx_app_img_red_packet_scrape s on v.red_packet_img_id = s.red_packet_id and #{memberAccount} = s.red_packet_user_id LEFT JOIN zx_app_img_red_packet_info p on v.red_packet_img_id = p.red_packet_img_id and p.red_packet_img_user_id = #{memberAccount} where v.red_packet_img_id in #{redPacketIds}
SELECT count(1) FROM ${tableName} WHERE red_packet_id = #{redPacketId} AND red_packet_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update zx_app_img_red_packet_info set red_packet_img_user_id = #{robUserId}, red_packet_img_date = sysdate() where red_packet_img_info_id = #{redPacketInfoId}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(a.red_packet_img_money) AS packetMoneyStock FROM zx_app_img_red_packet_info a WHERE a.red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketId} AND a.red_packet_img_user_id IS NULL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM zx_app_img_red_packet_info WHERE red_packet_img_id = #{redPacketId} AND red_packet_img_user_id IS NULL
